Package it.polimi.se2018.controller.tool_card.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDieToBoardAction
    This class is used to represent the action of adding a die to a board
    ChooseDieFromRoundTrackAction
    This class is used to represent the action of choosing a die from the roundtrack
    DraftDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of drafting a die
    FlipDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of flipping a die
    IncrementDecrementDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of incrementing or decrementing a die
    MoveSelectedDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of moving a selected die
    ReDrawDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of redrawing a die
    ReRollDraftPoolAction
    This class is used to represent the action of rerolling the draftpool
    RollDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of rolling a die
    SelectDieFromBoardAction
    This class is used to represent the action of selecting a die from the board
    SelectSameColorDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of selecting a die of the same color of another die
    SkipTurnAction
    This class is used to represent the action of skipping a turn
    SwapDraftedChosenDieAction
    This class is used to represent the action of swapping a drafted die with a chosen one
    ToolCardAction
    Generic action that a tool card can execute
